tasks.title: Create Theme Context and Provider System
tasks.description: Implement a React context for managing dark/light theme state with TypeScript types
tasks.details: Create a ThemeContext using React.createContext with TypeScript interfaces for theme state management. Include theme provider component with methods to toggle between light and dark modes. Implement proper typing for theme values and context consumer components.
tasks.testStrategy: Unit tests for theme context provider, theme toggle functionality, and TypeScript type checking

tasks.title: Implement SessionStorage Theme Persistence
tasks.description: Add utility functions to save and retrieve user theme preference from sessionStorage
tasks.details: Create utility functions to handle sessionStorage operations for theme preferences. Include error handling for storage unavailability, JSON serialization/deserialization, and fallback to system preferences when no stored preference exists.
tasks.testStrategy: Unit tests for sessionStorage utilities, error handling, and fallback behavior

tasks.title: Create Dark/Light Mode Toggle Component
tasks.description: Build a polished toggle switch component for theme switching with smooth animations
tasks.details: Design and implement a toggle component with smooth transitions, proper accessibility attributes (ARIA labels), keyboard support, and visual feedback. Include icon representations for sun/moon and ensure the component works well in both themes.
tasks.testStrategy: Unit tests for toggle functionality, accessibility features, and visual state changes

tasks.title: Update Root Layout with Theme Provider
tasks.description: Integrate theme system into the main application layout and add global dark mode styles
tasks.details: Wrap the application with ThemeProvider, add theme-aware CSS classes to the root layout, implement system preference detection on initial load, and ensure all child components can access theme context.
tasks.testStrategy: Integration tests for theme provider integration, system preference detection, and global theme application

tasks.title: Modernize Header Navigation with Mobile Responsiveness
tasks.description: Update header component with advanced Tailwind classes and mobile-first responsive design
tasks.details: Redesign the header with modern Tailwind components, implement hamburger menu for mobile, add proper navigation spacing and typography, include the theme toggle in the header, and ensure touch-friendly interactions on mobile devices.
tasks.testStrategy: Responsive design tests across breakpoints, mobile touch interaction tests, and theme integration tests

tasks.title: Enhance Sidebar with Mobile Collapsible Behavior
tasks.description: Improve sidebar component with modern styling and mobile-responsive collapsible functionality
tasks.details: Update sidebar with advanced Tailwind styling, implement overlay behavior on mobile, add smooth animations for open/close states, ensure proper z-index stacking, and optimize for touch interactions.
tasks.testStrategy: Mobile responsive tests, animation performance tests, and accessibility tests for collapsible behavior

tasks.title: Modernize Player Card Components
tasks.description: Update player cards with sophisticated Tailwind styling and theme-aware design
tasks.details: Redesign player cards with modern shadows, improved spacing, theme-aware colors, enhanced hover states, and mobile-optimized layouts. Include advanced Tailwind utilities for gradients, borders, and typography.
tasks.testStrategy: Visual regression tests, theme switching tests, and mobile layout tests

tasks.title: Optimize Search and Results Layouts for Mobile
tasks.description: Implement mobile-first responsive design for search interface and results display
tasks.details: Redesign search components with mobile-first approach, implement responsive grid layouts, optimize button sizes for touch, add proper spacing for mobile screens, and ensure readable typography across all device sizes.
tasks.testStrategy: Cross-device testing, touch interaction tests, and responsive layout validation

tasks.title: Implement Responsive Typography System
tasks.description: Create a cohesive typography scale that works across all themes and device sizes
tasks.details: Implement responsive typography using Tailwind's responsive utilities, create consistent font sizes and line heights across components, ensure proper contrast ratios in both themes, and optimize readability on mobile devices.
tasks.testStrategy: Typography consistency tests, contrast ratio validation, and readability tests across devices

tasks.title: Add Sophisticated Animations and Transitions
tasks.description: Implement smooth animations and micro-interactions throughout the application
tasks.details: Add Tailwind-based animations for component state changes, theme transitions, hover effects, and loading states. Ensure animations are performant, respect user motion preferences, and enhance rather than distract from the user experience.
tasks.testStrategy: Animation performance tests, accessibility motion preference tests, and cross-browser animation compatibility

tasks.title: Enhance Position Ratings Component with Modern Styling
tasks.description: Update position ratings display with theme-aware modern styling and mobile optimization
tasks.details: Apply advanced Tailwind styling to the position ratings component, ensure proper theme integration, optimize the expandable functionality for mobile touch, improve spacing and typography, and add subtle animations for expand/collapse.
tasks.testStrategy: Theme integration tests, mobile interaction tests, and animation performance validation

tasks.title: Comprehensive Cross-Device Testing and Polish
tasks.description: Perform thorough testing across devices and browsers, implement final polish and accessibility improvements
tasks.details: Test the application across various devices and screen sizes, validate accessibility compliance (WCAG 2.1 AA), optimize performance on mobile devices, fix any remaining styling inconsistencies, and ensure smooth user experience across all features.
tasks.testStrategy: Cross-browser testing, accessibility audit, performance profiling, and comprehensive user experience validation
